body.name: KARFUN Wireless Mouse, 2.4G Rechargeable Wireless Mouse, Backlit LED Portable Slim Computer Mouse for Laptop, PC, Computer, MacBook, iPad, Chromebook, Notebook
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 23 mins
features: ✅【Rechargeable Optical Mouse】 Cordless mouse with built-in rechargeable lithium battery, high cycle life. The mini mouse has no need to change the battery, it can be easily charged using the included USB cable, just 2-3 hours charging. You can use more than 7 days of working time and 30 days of standby time. Please charge the mouse for 2-3 hours before the first time to use it

✅【Led Colorful Light】This power-saving mouse with 7 different colorful breathing lights, 7 different color changes randomly while in use. The bottom of the mouse has a switch, you can switch lights freely. Low-key or sparkle, switch in one second, offering soothing light, creating a cool and fancy atmosphere for work and play

✅【3 DPI Switch Computer Mouse】3 Adjustable DPI switches (1000, 1200, 1600) freely change the mouse speed to meet different needs. Resolution optical tracking technology provides sensitivity and precise tracking on a wide range of surfaces. Plug and Play Wireless Mouse, 2.4GHz wireless technology provides a powerful and reliable connection, effective up to 10 meters of range, no need to install software that can be used for gaming or daily work. Note: There is no Bluetooth mode function

✅【Silent & Comfortable Mouse】Silent click wireless mouse with a classic ergonomic design offers your hand maximum support and comfort. The silent button reduces 90% noise, helps you concentrate on your work/study without disturbing others besides you, which makes it an ideal wireless mouse for office, conference room, cafe, library, or bedroom. Ultra-thin, lightweight and convenient for carrying or traveling

✅【Wide Compatibility】2.4Hz wireless mode works with computer, laptop, desktop with USB, type-c port, plug and play. The USB receiver is stored inside the back of the mouse. Note: 1. Hardware: PC with USB 2.0 and above; 2. Operating System: Mac OS, dos, Windows 2000, 2003, XP, Vista, Win7, Win8, Win10. The scroll wheel only works under the operating systems listed above. Please check or update the operating system before use

✅【Warm Reminder】1. It's out of power if the mouse LED lights stop. Please recharge it. 2. Unavailable or abnormal function. Please unplug the USB interface and plug it in again, restart the computer. 3. Unable to connect. Please check whether the switch at the bottom of the mouse is in place and whether the mouse battery is too low. 4. To save power and provide long-term usage, the wireless mouse will fall asleep after 10 minutes of no-operation. It can be woken up by clicking any button. 5. If you do not use the mouse for a long time, please turn off the "OFF" button to save power

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and price
reviews.reviewText: I love the options for the use of this mouse. I have 2 and one uses the usb port while the other one uses the type C and they hold a charge forever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse for 2 computers
reviews.reviewText: Easy instructions, setup, and works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO BATTERIES NEEDED!
reviews.reviewText: This is now the only type of mouse we use. Yes, I convinced my whole household. These are it! In my household and job, I am the ONE that put this type of mouse in everyone's mind. They can thank me for it later. 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless Rechargeable Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it fits my hand very comfortable and it lights up so it's easy to find in the dark. I will be buying another one for my son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Kids
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this mouse is a little too small for adults, but it was perfect for my son's gaming set up! It matched perfectly with his mechanical keyboard. He loves cats so he absolutely loved that this mouse has a little paw on it. We were both excited for the bright colors when the mouse lights up. It was super easy to connect through the bluetooth adapter. The battery lasts a decent amount of time (for us it is a couple of days). It is easy to recharge and it's good to go in a few hours of charging. It's definitely not the fanciest mouse but it's a fun, functional, good quality mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice basic mouse, with a nice extra
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouse to replace one that suddenly stopped working, and so far so good. It took quite awhile to fully charge, which tells me the battery life is probably really good on this one. Unlike the one it replaced, the scroll wheel on this one is very comfortable. There are (optional) lights on the mouse to give it a nice glow, which again, is more to my liking than the one it replaced. I may actually turn on the lights on this mouse.As a mouse it seems to work great. Nice and responsive. It has a nifty button I've never seen before that if you hit it, it immediately iconifies your whole desktop, and press it again and it brings everything back (similar to pressing on the far right side of the Windows task bar). I think it also can be used to manage multiple desktops, but I don't use that feature. Nice tough though. It also has a button that changes the sensitivity of the mouse, but I didn't notice a whole lot of difference there.The one really cool extra is that it came with a USB C to standard USB adapter (the receiver that plugs into the computer is standard USB). I don't need that on my current computer, but it's nice that they included the adapter. The documentation that came with the mouse invited me to visit the manufacturer's Facebook page for support, which tells me they are actively supporting the product, which is comforting.The only negative I have is that the box was slightly crushed during shipping, but this is a reflection on Amazon rather than the manufacturer. Everything was fine though.
